name: Prakhar khare
review: Vedant and I  had worked together for over 2 years, and I've seen him consistently seek out new challenges to take on, whether it’s getting to the root of buggy software, building a web application, or participating in charity runs in his own time. Anyone wishing to hire or work with vedant will undoubtedly enjoy the same positive working relationship that I have had.

name: Vikash Sharma
review: Vedant's enthusiasm for web development is infectious, he loves what he does and enjoys sharing anything new he discovers.
